page.title: 17THE BICESTER ADVERTISER
page.content: ROADS:The town has its own weekly paper called the Bicester Advertiser.Since Christmas every road in Bicester seems to have been dug up for some purpose or other.The paper reported the roadwork's funny side and the Round Table are holdilottery to guess where the next hole in Sheep Street(the main street) will be dug.All money raised will go to charity. HMS BICESTER:On June 4 1985 the new HMS Bicester was launched.Thiss is the 3rd ship to bear the name,the original was named after the Bicester and Warden Hill Hunt.The mayor of Bicester was invited to the launching at Southampton.
